messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson, found a casing at 12:31am which Technician Muhammad ph0tographed. Sergeant McMullen informed Detective Morton of a blood trail leading to N0rth Derbignay Street. Detective Morton also met with Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor, who were present during a home invasion. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers tested them for gunshot residue. Detective David Trehan's Coroner's Office Day Records classified two fatalities as homicides. Detective Morton also interacted with witnesses regarding suspect Reynell Payne. Detective Aucoin secured the crime scene and Detective Ryan Aucoin directed evidence collection. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum were all mentioned in relation to the case. Additionally, Detective Pratt from the Homicide Section and Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger were involved in the investigation.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted in finding a spent casing at the crime scene.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Helped place the decedent in a body bag.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and collected the spent casing at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Informed Detective Morton about a blood trail at the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Conducted interviews with eyewitnesses and was informed about the blood trail by Sergeant McMullen.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted gunshot residue tests on Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Coroner's Office Day Records classified two fatalities as homicides under his documentation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the crime scene after the investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ryan AucoinOfficer Context: Directed the Crime Lab personnel during evidence collection.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Mentioned in context with managing a police unit.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Mentioned as managing a police unit.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Mentioned as managing a police unit together.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Mentioned as managing a police unit together.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to the case.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to the case.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to the case.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to the case.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled a scene as part of the Homicide Section.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Part of the Scientific Criminal Investigations Division, involved in sketching a scene.Officer Role: Officer
